# cook your code here
T = int(raw_input())
for i in range(T):
    n = int(raw_input())
    l = raw_input().split()
    m = 1000*int(l[0])+100*int(l[1])+10*int(l[2])
    i=9
    flag = 0
    while(i>0):
        j = 9
        while(j>=0):
            p = i*10000+m+j
            if(p%n==0):
                flag = 1
                break
            else:
                j = j-1
        if flag==1:
            break
        i=i-1
    if i==0:
        print 0
    else:
        print i,j,p//n
